tone_and_atmosphere.title: Tone & Atmosphere
content: Humor emerges from character and situation
Stakes can be serious but tone is comedic
Timing and rhythm create comedic effect
Joy and laughter are central goals

pacing.title: Pacing
content: Comedic timing through beat and pause
Rule of threes for comedic structure

scene_construction.title: Scene Construction
content: Set up situations with comedic potential
Characters react authentically to ridiculous situations

common_pitfalls.title: Common Pitfalls to Avoid
content: Don't explain jokes or over-telegraph punchlines
Avoid making humor mean-spirited without purpose
Don't sacrifice character consistency for jokes
Resist forcing humor into every moment
Don't rely on the same comedic beats repeatedly
Avoid humor that undercuts genuine emotional moments

highlights: Timing and rhythm create comedic effect
